name: news-2
author: skyler
title: Version 0.1.3
body:
Mostly this involves cleaning up the code, and adding code comments.

0.1.4 should refactor some of the selection of elements under the hood, along with some general stability, like supporting symlinks for localhost.

Looking ahead, 0.2.0 should include easier user creation, some kind of WYSIWYG, and maybe file upload.

Progress! âœŒ

Also lazy-loading for methods, along with HTTP ETags. That should go into 0.2.0.

...And while I'm thinking about it, divorcing "edited on" from "created on" is going to be a good idea for 0.2.0 also.
